sentences.sentence: Goniometer rAn instrument used in measuring angles.
sentences.translation: 角度计-用来测量角度的设备。

sentences.sentence: Cervical range of motion and pressure pain thresholds were measured using a goniometer and an algometer.
sentences.translation: 颈活动度和压痛阈用关节角度计和痛觉计进行测量。

sentences.sentence: This paper studied a kind of automatic test technology of the parameters used in a dual-CCD TV goniometer.
sentences.translation: 本文研究的是一种由双CCD构成的电视测角仪的参数自动检测技术。
